item.title: A Better Tomorrow
item.author: Author
item.description: Unsplash Image Credit: Spencer Watson A Better Tomorrow As an independent consultant, I lead technical teams and move the needle for modernization in enterprises. I keep coming back to the idea of what the project looks like for a new team member. What is the architecture? How are pull requests done? What technologies are we using? What tech stack do they want to move towards? When I join a new team, I ask the most important question: How do we deliver software to our users?
